main event: A report of a small jet-like object observed in Atlanta, Georgia on 22 August 1956.
interesting points: The object made approximately 30 degrees per second turns and traveled 2-3 miles in 2-3 minutes., The sighting duration was reported to be 2-3 minutes., The object was described as bright and larger than a basketball., Operator's comments indicated potential involvement from Dobbin AFB., The observer saw low flying aircraft in the area at the time of the sighting.
witness description: Mrs. _____, age 25, residing in Atlanta, Georgia.
